Hydras:

Hydras looked her with an indulgent way "Haaaa, I seee"hissed the 
male"Can I see that Decepticon Matrix????"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 7/31/03 12:47:23 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "What's wrong??, my dear MAxima?"  said Hydras
> 
> Still being repaired, she looked up at Hydras. usually she would 
keep secrets 
> from others. But not him. She couldn't keep a secret from him. How 
could 
> she... he was still Megatron. She would give her very existance 
for him. 
> 
> Recomposing herself. "I.. was given an .. object. Which I now 
carry. Given to 
> me for safe keeping." in a softer tone. "no one else must know I 
have it." 
> she looked at him with a slight concern, not sure how he would 
react to it. "I 
> was told it was a dormant Decepticon Matrix." Somehow, it was not 
so dormant. 
> It seemed to be attatching itself to her. 
> 
> Her repairs soon enough was nearly complete.
